title: Magical Play - DUAL AUDIO - Complete DVDRIP + Special
description:
This is my first torrent, please go easy on my ego, and blame the guy who mastered the dvd for the noise around the faces(only in certain scenes thankfully)!

Magical Play eps1-4 / DUAL AUDIO / Soft Subs - Complete DVDRIP + 3D Special

DVD Res, x264, selectable audio and subs, CCCP included to streamline any MKV issues people may have. Remember media player classic is your friend.

I\\\&#039;ll be enlisting a friends phat net feed to seed later this week, but the initial upload is going to take a day or so on my crippled aussie pipe.

Finally got my hands on a dvd source, dub was appallingly bad but the end of episode three healed my sorrow. Thank the lord for jap audio.

MKV with ac3 audio, directors commentary in episode 4.

Now why do I crave a tuna sandwich so badly....?
